titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii, [1]4 Martii, 1648 [i.e. 1649] resolved by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that Sir Iohn Stowell knight be proceeded against for life [i]n the upper bench ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first two lines of text.
Imperfect: creased, with loss of text.
"Ordered by the Commons ... that the resolutions of the House touching delinquents and their compositions be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Scobell. Cler. Parliament."
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
